ARGUMENT
t

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | bloval.3 | |- N = ( U normOpOLD W ) |
| 2 |  | bloval.4 | |- L = ( U LnOp W ) |
| 3 |  | bloval.5 | |- B = ( U BLnOp W ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_bloval | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. NrmCVec ) -> B = { t e. L | ( N ` t ) < +oo } ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. NrmCVec ) -> ( T e. B <-> T e. { t e. L | ( N ` t ) < +oo } ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( t = T -> ( N ` t ) = ( N ` T ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_breq1d | |- ( t = T -> ( ( N ` t ) < +oo <-> ( N ` T ) < +oo ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_elrab | |- ( T e. { t e. L | ( N ` t ) < +oo } <-> ( T e. L /\ ( N ` T ) < +oo ) ) |
| 9 | 5, 8 | #P_syl6bb | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. NrmCVec ) -> ( T e. B <-> ( T e. L /\ ( N ` T ) < +oo ) ) ) |
